writing.instruction: Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
writing.prompt: The diagram below shows how instant noodles are manufactured.

writing.instruction: Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
writing.prompt: Some people say that advertising is extremely successful at persuading us to buy things. Other people think that advertising is so common that we no longer pay attention to it. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
